      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String[] params)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initializes values for variables myName, administrator_name, administrator_pass and checks the content of parameter params for null value or content length different than 3.
        Specified by:
        init in interface pserver.pservlets.PService
        Parameters:
        params - An array of strings containing the parameters.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - The general exception is produced when class loaded with wrong parameters.

        Specified by:

      • service

        public int service(pserver.data.VectorMap parameters,
          java.lang.StringBuffer response,
          pserver.data.DBAccess dbAccess)
        Creates a service for Administrator mode when a command is sent to PServer. The command is identified from its name and proper methods for the management of this command are called. A response code is produced depending on results.
        Specified by:
        service in interface pserver.pservlets.PService
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters needed for this service.
        response - The response string that is created.
        dbAccess - The database manager.
        Returns:
        The value of response code.
